title: Four Practical Prayer Tools
itunes:author: Guest: Jodie Berndt
itunes:summary:
How can you make time to pray for your kids when life gets busy? John and Danny discuss how some simple and practical ideas have been helpful in praying for their children, amidst the busyness of life. Featuring Jodie Berndt.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.


Receive Jodie Berndt's book "Praying the Scriptures for your Children" for your donation of any amount:

https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-05-17?refcd=1465801


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/four-practical-prayer-tools/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/praying-scripture-over-your-child-s-life-digital/?refcd=1465801


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
